children.text: %aṣṭau ca vyavahārān chāyā-antān bhavati gaṇakas sas//
saṅkalite aṃśās yojyās vyavakalite aṃśa-antaram kāryam//
uttara-kṛtis antya-guṇā %tri-guṇā ca uttara-ghanas ca ghanas//
trairāśike pramāṇam phalam iccā ādi-antayos sadṛśa-rāśī/
icchā phalena guṇitā pramāṇa-bhaktā phalam bhavati//
karṇa-kṛtes koṭi-kṛtim viśodhya mūlam bhujas bhujasya kṛtim/
karṇa-%dvayena pūrva-vat āvādhe lambakau ca pṛthak//
%tri-bhje bhujau tu bhūmis tad-lambas lambaka-adharam khaṇḍam/
iṣṭasya bhujasya kṛtis bhaktā ūnā iṣṭena tad-#dalam koṭis/
āyata-karṇas bāhū bhuja-kṛtis iṣṭena bhājitā iṣṭa-ūnā/
bāhu-kṛtes %tri-guṇāyās yadi adhikas bhūs mukham hīnas//
adhikas bhūs mukha-hīnas bāhu-%dvitayam bhujau anyau//
śarayos phalayos aikyam grāsas grāsa-ūnam aikyam tat//
labdham vyavahāra-phale prakṣipya bhavati phalam sūkṣmam//
chedena iṣṭa-yuta-ūnena āptam bhājyāt anaṣṭam iṣṭa-guṇam/
teṣām dṛśyau vyastau kṛtvā tad-sthānayos ca iṣṭau//
guṇyam guṇa-kāram vā guṇayet chedena bhāga-hārasya/
acchedasya chedam #rūpam kṛtvā anyat ukta-vat sarvam/
apavartyau cheda-guṇau tulyena iṣṭena guṇyau vā//
rāśes iṣṭa-yuta-ūnāt vadhas kṛtis vā iṣṭa-kṛti-yuktas//
dik-mātram etat anyat jyā-utpattau kuṭṭake ca kathayiṣye/
prāyeṇa yatas praśnās kuṭṭākārāt ṛte na śakyante/
jñātum vakṣyāmi tatas kuṭṭākāram saha praśnais//
yat tat paraspara-hṛtam labdham adhas adhas pṛthak sthāpyam//
śeṣam tathā iṣṭa-guṇitam yathā agrayos antareṇa saṃyuktam/
śudhyati guṇakas sthāpyas labdham ca antyāt upāntya-guṇas//
tena hṛtau nis-chedau tau eva parasparam hṛtayos//
labdham adhas adhas sthāpyam tathā iṣṭa-guṇa-kāra-saṅguṇam śeṣam/
śudhyati yathā %eka-hīnam guṇakas sthāpyas phalam ca antyāt//
agra-antam upāntyena sva-ūrdhvas guṇitas antya-saṃyutas bhaktam/
evam sameṣu viṣameṣu ṛṇam dhanam dhanam ṛṇam yat uktam tat/
guṇakas chedas chedas guṇakas dhanam ṛṇam ṛṇam dhanam kāryam/
vargam padam padam kṛtis antyāt viparītam ādyam tat//
yas jānāti yuga-ādi graha-yuga-yātais pṛthak pṛthak kathitais/
bha-gaṇa-ādyam iṣṭa-śeṣam kadā indu-divase raves guru-dine vā/
jña-dine rāśīn kathayati kuṭṭākāram sas jānāti//
jña-dine yat aṃśa-śeṣam vikalā-śeṣam kadā tat indu-dine/
bhānos atha vā śaśinas yas kathayati kuṭṭaka-jñas sas//
tithi-māna-dineṣu iṣṭās ye arka-ādyās te punar kadā teṣu/
tad-cheda-dinais tāvat dina-vāras yāvat iṣṭas syāt//
yas rāśi-ādīn dṛṣṭvā madhyasya iṣṭasya katahyati dyu-gaṇam/
naṣṭa-stheṣu iṣṭān tān kṛtvā bhaktvā ukta-vat śeṣam//
yas sādhayati uparitanān sa-madhyamān kuṭṭaka-jñas sas//
yena guṇas śeṣa-yutas chedas śudhyati hṛtas sva-guṇakena/
tad-bhuktam śeṣam phalam evam śeṣāt graha-dyu-gaṇau//
jānāti yas yuga-gatam kathitāt adhimāsa-śeṣakāt iṣṭāt/
avama-avaśeṣatas vā tad-yogāt vā sas kuṭṭa-jñas//
bhūyas te yas kathayati pṛthak pṛthak vā sas kuṭṭa-jñas//
dhanayos dhanam ṛṇam ṛṇayos dhana-ṛṇayos antaram sama-aikyam #kham/
ūnam adhikāt viśodhyam dhanam dhanāt ṛṇam ṛṇāt adhikam ūnāt/
vyastam tad-antaram syāt ṛṇam dhanam dhanam ṛṇam bhavati//
śodhyam yadā dhanam ṛṇāt ṛṇam dhanāt vā tadā kṣepyam//
ṛṇam ṛṇa-dhanayos ghātas dhanam ṛṇayos dhana-vadhas dhanam bhavati/
dhana-bhaktam dhanam ṛṇa-hṛtam ṛṇam dhanam bhavati #kham #kha-bhaktam #kham/
bhaktam ṛṇena dhanam ṛṇam dhanena hṛtam ṛṇam ṛṇam bhavati//
#kha-uddhṛtam ṛṇam dhanam vā tad-chedam #kham ṛṇa-dhana-vibhaktam vā/
ṛṇa-dhanayos vargas svam #kham #khasya padam kṛtis yat tat//
karaṇī lambas tad-kṛtis iṣṭa-hṛtā iṣṭa-ūna-saṃyutā alpā bhūs/
guṇyas tiryak adhas adhas guṇaka-samas tad-guṇas sahitas//
%prathamam rūpāṇi anyat tatas dvitīyam karaṇī asakṛt//
maṇḍala-śeṣam vi-%ekam bhānos jña-dine kadā bhavati//
ādyāt varṇāt anyān varṇān prohya ādya-mānam āḍya-hṛtam/
tad-yogāt dyu-gaṇam vā yas kathayati kuṭṭaka-jñas sas//
tad-vivarāt dyu-gaṇam vā yas kathayati kuṭṭaka-jñas sas//
tad-śeṣais ca yuga-gatam yas kathayati kuṭṭaka-jñas sas//
aṃśaka-śeṣeṇa yutāt liptā-śeṣāt tad-antarāt atha vā/
bhānos jña-dine dyu-gaṇam yas kathayati kuṭṭaka-jñas sas//
divasa-karasya iṣṭa-dine kurvan ā vatsarāt gaṇakas//
iṣṭa-yuta-ūnam tulyam kurvan ā vatsarāt gaṇakas//
alpe adhikas adhike alpas kṣepyas bhāvita-hṛtau vyastam//
%navatim dṛṣṭvā sūryam kurvan ā vatsarāt gaṇakas//
sidhyati vinā api bhāvita-sama-karaṇāt kim kṛtam tat atas//
mūlam dvidhā iṣṭa-vargāt guṇaka-guṇāt iṣṭa-yuta-vihīnāt ca/
ādya-vadhas guṇaka-guṇas saha antya-ghātena kṛtam antyam//
kṛtvā antya-ādya-pade ye prakṣepe śodhane vā iṣṭe//
varge guṇake kṣepas kena cit uddhṛta-yuta-ūnitas dalitas/
yais ūnas yais ca yutas rūpais vargas tad-aikyam iṣṭa-hṛtam/
iṣṭa-ūnam tad-#dala-kṛtis ūnā abhyadhikā bhavati rāśis//
yābhyām kṛtis adhika-ūnas tad-antaram hṛta-yuta-ūnam iṣṭena/
sa-%ekā jña-dine vargam kurvan ā vatsarāt gaṇakas//
varge bṛhaspati-dine kurvan ā vatsarāt gaṇakas//
kṛtim %aṣṭa-%śata-ūnam vā kurvan ā vatsarāt gaṇakas//
%ṣaṣṭi-ūnam vā vargam kurvan ā vatsarāt gaṇakas//
#rūpeṇa yutam vargam kurvan ā vatsarāt gaṇakas//
%tri-ghana-ūnam vā vargam kurvan ā vatsarāt gaṇakas//
pṛthak %eka-yutam vargam kurvan ā vatsarāt gaṇakas//
%tribhis ūnam vā vargam kurvan ā vatsarāt gaṇakas//
vargam vadham ca sa-%ekam kurvan ā vatsarāt gaṇakas//
bhānos jña-dine vargam kurvan ā vatsarāt gaṇakas//
%ṣaṣṭyā %aṣṭabhis ca ūnam kurvan ā vatsarāt gaṇakas//
atha vā madhyamam iṣṭam kurvan ā vatsarāt gaṇakas//
ravim indu-bhāga-śeṣāt kurvan ā vatsarāt gaṇakas//
cheda-dinais adhikas asmāt anya-graha-śeṣam iṣṭas vā//
dyu-gaṇam avama-avaśeṣāt ravi-candrau madhyamau sphuṭau atha vā/
evam tithim graham vā kurvan ā vatsarāt gaṇakas//
śudhyati bhū-dina-bhaktam vi-%ekam cāndrais tad-uktis iyam//
bhāga-kalā-vikalā-aikyam dṛṣṭvā vikalā-antaram ca ke śeṣe/
tena yuta-ūnas yogas dalitas śeṣe pṛthak abhīṣṭe// Cb.99]
hṛdi-ghātram amī praśnās praśnān anyān %sahasra-śas kuryāt/
anyais dattān praśnān uktyā evam sādhayet karaṇais//
jana-saṃsadi daiva-vidām tejas nāśayati bhānus iva bhānām/
prati-sūtram amī praśnās pathitās sa-uddeśakeṣu sūtreṣu/
dṛṣṭvā dina-%ardha-ghaṭikā yas arka-jñas akṣa-aṃśakān vijānāti/
asta-antara-ghaṭikābhis yas jñātāt jñeyam ānayati tastmāt/
madhya-gatim yuga-bha-gaṇān ānayati tatas sas tantra-jñas//
iṣṭa-gṛha-auccya-jñas yas tad-antara-jñas nirīkṣyate tu jale/
gṛha-bhitti-agram darśayati darpaṇe vā sas tantra-jñas//
śaṅku-chāyā-jñas vā bhūmes chāyām sas tantra-jñas//
dṛṣṭvā gṛha-tala-antara-jālabhos dṛṣṭvā agram gṛhasya bhūmi-jñas/
vetti gṛha-auccyam dṛṣṭvā taila-stham vā sas tantra-jñas//
vīkṣya gṛha-agram salile prasārya salilam punar sva-bhū-jñāne/
ānayati jalāt bhūmim gṛhasya vā auccyam sas tantra-jñas//
kuḍye arka-tejasas yas vetti ārūḍhim sas tantra-jñas//
udayais jñātas jñātāt jñeyas prāk-aparayos jñeyas//
jñātam kṛtvā madhyam bhūyas anya-dine tad-antaram bhuktis/
śaṅku-antareṇa guṇitā chāyā chāyā-antareṇa bhaktā bhūs /
phala-bhūs nyaste toye prati-rūpa-agram gṛhasya narāt//
saṃkhyaikyaṃ tādṛk yādṛk prathamas trirahito naṣṭe//
mādhyaiḥ kṛtaiś ca dalitaiḥ samasaṃkhyāyāṃ kramotkramāt kṣeppam/
viṣamāyāṃ vyekāyāṃ dalam kramād uttkramāt saikam//
laghusaṃkhyā padadalitā parato'dho'dhaś ca śudhyati hṛtā yaiḥ/
svāt parato'nyaikyam adhaḥ prastārād uktavad ihādyaiḥ//
vyastāni antyāt atha vā iṣus utkrama-jyā dhanus tābhyām//
evam jīvā-khaṇḍāni alpāni bahūni vā ādya-khaṇḍāni/
kṛtvā ukta-khaṇḍakāni jyā-%ardha-ānayanam na laghu asmāt//
